member.name: M:CMS.MediaLibrary.MediaFileInfo.GetUniqueNameWhereCondition(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Constructs base where condition for checking column value uniqueness.
Condition is modified to check name uniqueness on the file path. Name is unique if there is no other file with the same name in the same folder.
member.param: Name of the column in which the uniqueness should be preserved (CodeNameColumn/DisplayNameColumn)
Name which should be saved in the column (evenutally with suffix)
ID of the current object (this object will be excluded from the search for duplicate names)
If true, the names must match exactly
member.returns: Where condition used to check for unique name

member.name: M:CMS.MediaLibrary.MediaLibraryHelper.GetDirectUrl(CMS.MediaLibrary.MediaFileInfo)
member.summary: Returns a direct URL to the media file.
member.param: Media file for which the URL is generated.
member.remarks:
Generates various URL types depending on the media library location:
URL Location
~/mediaLibraryFolder/filename.extension Media file is located in a local media library on the current site.
http://domain.com/mediaLibraryFolder/filename.extension Media file is located in a local media library on a different site.
http://CDN/mediaLibraryFolder/filename.extension Media file is located in a media library stored in CDN.
~/getmedia/fileGUID/fileName.extension Media file is located in a media library which is located outside of the CMS application on the current site.
http://domain.com/getmedia/fileGUID/fileName.extension Media file is located in a media library which is located outside of the CMS application on a different site.

member.name: M:CMS.MediaLibrary.MediaLibraryHelper.GetPermanentUrl(CMS.MediaLibrary.MediaFileInfo)
member.summary: Returns a permanent URL to the media file.
member.param: Media file which the URL will be generated for.
member.remarks:
Generates various URL types depending on the media library location:
URL Location
~/getmedia/fileGUID/fileName.extension Media file is located in a media library on the current site.
http://domain.com/getmedia/fileGUID/fileName.extension Media file is located in a media library on a different site.
